channel.title: People can't log on with my client
channel.description: I downloaded a client and a server, i edited both of them. I let one of my admins download the client to test it out, but when he tried to log in all it would say is error connecting to server. People can log on with silabs, and it has no server id thing where u type in the server (and yes i have the set server as my ip and the port is right). So if anyone has any idea what could be wrong please post here. THX!!! ;D

item.title: People can't log on with my client
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.source: People can't log on with my client

item.title: People can't log on with my client
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

It should be this

client.main(new String[] { "totalpk", "no-ip", "biz" }); } }

Read full topic
item.source: People can't log on with my client

item.title: People can't log on with my client
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

im not sure if i did this right but u guys tell me

client.main(new String[] { "totalpk.no-ip.biz", "", "" }); } }

Read full topic
item.source: People can't log on with my client

item.title: People can't log on with my client
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

You can change the preset IP in EGUI.java, Also you can change some other IP,s in client.java, and GUI.java.

Before you let someone test out your client, make sure you delete your .rar file, and then on your server files right click and do add to blablabla.rar

and let them try that one out.

Read full topic
item.source: People can't log on with my client

item.title: People can't log on with my client
item.dc:creator: @PenG PenG™
item.description:
@PenG wrote:

I’d help if I remembered. but you need special client for it to be set to your specific IP, And maybe try putting up NO-IP or something. Try that

Read full topic
